properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Zaeni matunda mema,
zaeni matunda yale,
zaeni yenye baraka,
zaeni ya kheri.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Bwana akiyapokea
yatabarikiwa vyema,
zaeni matunda mema
zaeni ya kheri.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Safisha mwenendo wako,
safisha matendo yako,
safisha na Bwana Yesu,
safisha yote.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Fanyeni kazi kindugu,
fanyeni kazi kwa bidii,
fanyeni na Bwana Yesu
fanyeni na yote.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tolea matendo yako
pamoja na moyo wako,
naye Bwana Mungu wako
atakubariki.
